skill.name: Chatbot Implementation
skill.description: Details of the RAG Chatbot, including UI and backend logic.
skill.summary: Details of the RAG Chatbot, including UI and backend logic.
skill.author: AbdulSamad94

security_audit.summary: This skill contains only documentation (SKILL.md) describing RAG chatbot architecture. No executable code, scripts, network calls, or filesystem access is present. Pure documentation with no security concerns.

content.value_statement: Users struggle to extract knowledge from large documents. This skill provides chatbot architecture for building RAG-powered interfaces that retrieve relevant content and generate accurate responses.
actual_capabilities: Build RAG-powered chatbot backend with query processing
Implement vector search using Qdrant database
Create responsive floating chat UI with resize controls
Integrate OpenAI and Gemini embedding models
Generate context-aware responses from document chunks
Support dark and light themes with CSS variables
limitations: Requires external API keys for OpenAI or Gemini
Textbook content must be pre-embedded into vector store
No voice or image input support

use_cases.description: Build chatbots that help students learn from course materials using RAG

use_cases.title: Implement RAG chatbots
use_cases.description: Add intelligent question-answering to document-based applications

use_cases.title: Build knowledge assistants
use_cases.description: Create AI helpers that answer questions from written content

prompt_templates.title: Basic Chat Setup
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a simple chatbot interface that loads previous conversation history

prompt_templates.title: RAG Integration
prompt_templates.prompt: How do I connect a vector database to retrieve relevant documents before generating responses?

prompt_templates.title: UI Customization
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a floating chat component with resize controls for small, medium, and large sizes

prompt_templates.title: Context Awareness
prompt_templates.prompt: How can the chatbot use user profile information to personalize responses?

output_examples.input: Build a chatbot that answers questions about my documentation
output: Backend receives user query and conversation history
Query is embedded using AI model (OpenAI or Gemini)
Qdrant vector database searches for relevant document chunks
Context is constructed from top matches
AI generates response using retrieved context
UI renders markdown-formatted response in chat window

best_practices: Pre-embed documents in batches to improve search quality
Limit context window to most relevant chunks to reduce latency
Implement rate limiting to prevent API abuse
anti_patterns: Sending entire documents to AI without chunking
Ignoring user conversation history in context
Hardcoding API keys directly in source code

faq.question: What AI models are supported?
faq.answer: OpenAI and Gemini models for embeddings and response generation

faq.question: What vector database does this skill use?
faq.answer: Qdrant for storing and searching document embeddings

faq.question: Can I use this with Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, this skill is compatible with Claude Code for development workflows

faq.question: What programming language is used?
faq.answer: TypeScript and React for UI components, Next.js for API routes

faq.question: Is the chat interface mobile-friendly?
faq.answer: Yes, the chatbot UI is fully responsive for mobile devices

faq.question: Does it support dark mode?
faq.answer: Yes, the styling supports both dark and light themes using CSS variables
